hints.label: lem-no-momentum-source-cloning
hints.title: No Momentum Source from Cloning
hints.content:
38: :label: lem-no-momentum-source-cloning
39: 
40: The cloning operator conserves total four-momentum exactly:
41: 
42: $$
43: \sum_{i=1}^N p_i^\mu \bigg|_{\text{after}} = \sum_{i=1}^N p_i^\mu \bigg|_{\text{before}}
44: $$
45: 
46: **Consequence**: There is **no source term** $J^\mu_{\text{clone}}$ in the energy-momentum conservation law. The cloning operator does not modify:
47: 
48: $$
49: \nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu} = J^\nu_{\text{Langevin}}
50: $$
51:
hints.raw_directive:
35: ### 2.1 Momentum Conservation
36: 
37: :::{prf:lemma} No Momentum Source from Cloning
38: :label: lem-no-momentum-source-cloning
39: 
40: The cloning operator conserves total four-momentum exactly:
41: 
42: $$
43: \sum_{i=1}^N p_i^\mu \bigg|_{\text{after}} = \sum_{i=1}^N p_i^\mu \bigg|_{\text{before}}
44: $$
45: 
46: **Consequence**: There is **no source term** $J^\mu_{\text{clone}}$ in the energy-momentum conservation law. The cloning operator does not modify:
47: 
48: $$
49: \nabla_\mu T^{\mu\nu} = J^\nu_{\text{Langevin}}
50: $$
51: 
52: where $J^\nu_{\text{Langevin}}$ is the friction-noise source from the kinetic operator (Appendix B).

hints.label: prop-cloning-cooling
hints.title: Cloning Energy Sink
hints.content:
67: :label: prop-cloning-cooling
68: 
69: The cloning operator dissipates kinetic energy at rate:
70: 
71: $$
72: \frac{dE_{\text{kin}}}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{clone}} = -\frac{1 - \alpha_{\text{rest}}^2}{2\tau_{\text{clone}}} m\langle \|v_{\text{rel}}\|^2 \rangle_{\text{collision groups}} < 0
73: $$
74: 
75: where $\tau_{\text{clone}}$ is the average time between cloning events and $v_{\text{rel}}$ is relative velocity within collision groups.
76: 
77: **Physical Interpretation**: Cloning acts as an **effective friction** that reduces the temperature:
78: 
79: $$
80: \frac{dT}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{clone}} = -\gamma_{\text{clone}}(T - T_{\text{target}})
81: $$
82:
hints.raw_directive:
64: ### 2.2 Energy Dissipation
65: 
66: :::{prf:proposition} Cloning Energy Sink
67: :label: prop-cloning-cooling
68: 
69: The cloning operator dissipates kinetic energy at rate:
70: 
71: $$
72: \frac{dE_{\text{kin}}}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{clone}} = -\frac{1 - \alpha_{\text{rest}}^2}{2\tau_{\text{clone}}} m\langle \|v_{\text{rel}}\|^2 \rangle_{\text{collision groups}} < 0
73: $$
74: 
75: where $\tau_{\text{clone}}$ is the average time between cloning events and $v_{\text{rel}}$ is relative velocity within collision groups.
76: 
77: **Physical Interpretation**: Cloning acts as an **effective friction** that reduces the temperature:
78: 
79: $$
80: \frac{dT}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{clone}} = -\gamma_{\text{clone}}(T - T_{\text{target}})
81: $$
82: 
83: where $\gamma_{\text{clone}} \sim (1 - \alpha_{\text{rest}}^2)/\tau_{\text{clone}}$.
